animeTitle: Gintama': Futon ni Haitte kara Buki Nokoshi ni Kizuite Neru ni Nerenai Toki mo Aru
animeDescription: Bundled with limited edition of the 58th Gintama manga volume.The tagline for the bundled anime reads, "It's time for all the Yorozuya members ...to wake up just one more time."(Source: MAL News, edited)
